about.title: ABOUT US
about.title.text: At Everbuild, we specialize in unique and highly effective software solutions. Our approach combines innovation with precision and delivers customized results that redefine the digital landscape.

card1.text: Noted offers a contemporary note-taking app experience, facilitating seamless integration of pen inputs with Markdown formatting. Completely in open-source format, supported by GPU acceleration.

card2.text: Our support platform improves user satisfaction and makes troubleshooting easier for small to medium sized teams. Integrated features ensure smooth processes and community engagement.

card3.title: We ü§ù Nature
card3.text: We rely on sustainable technologies and environmentally friendly solutions to protect nature. Our products and services protect the environment and save resources. We also support non-profit environmental protection organizations with a portion of our profits.

section.title: An ambitious team with a shared goal
section.subtitle: OUR VALUES
section.text: Our values are the foundation of our corporate culture and guide our actions. We proudly integrate them into all our projects.

value1.title: Take pride in what we do
value1.text:
Value quality and integrity in everything we do. At all
times. No exceptions.

value2.title: Care about our team
value2.text: Understand what matters to our members. Give them what they need to do their best work.

value3.title: Do the impossible
value3.text: Be energized by difficult problems. Revel in unknowns. Ask "Why?", but always question, "Why not?"
